Kaboom Gateway Service

POST to /event to register application launch/crash

Event:
	t: type
		S: app start
		C: app crash
	dt: date and time (on the client)
	m: message
	d: details (Base64-encoded)
	

Launch event:
```
{"t":"S","dt":"2018-12-19T16:36:02.632+01"}
```

Crash event:
```
{"t":"C","dt":"2018-12-19T16:46:01.454+01","m":"Hello Exception!","d":""}
```
